rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV2263}
Must have passed 1 units in {CIV2263, MNE2010}
For COURSE_CODE IN {4618} Do Must have passed 1 units in {CIV2263} Otherwise Permission required
For COURSE_CODE IN {4618} Do true Otherwise Permission required

description: This unit provides the fundamentals of mine ventilation, including properties of air, gas, dust and pollutants control, principles of airflow, ventilation network theory and mine ventilation system design, with the emphasis on analysis, systems design and practical application.
